players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and he knows who the mafioso is"
You: "Alice was not involved in Diana's death"
Charlie: "I will investigate Bob next. He has not spoken and might have information."
You: "I have an alibi for Night 1. I was at the barn, tending to the animals."
Bob: "I'm still trying to figure out what happened to Diana. I don't know who the mafioso is, but I'll keep an eye on Charlie and Alice."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
